skins.shipDescription: Repair ship Akashi Can be built after unlocking
skins.selfIntroduction: Nya! I am the one and only repair ship, Akashi. I supported the front lines until the destruction of the Truk naval base. If you get all scratched up, just leave it to me nya!
skins.acquisition: I am the only repair ship in the entire Sakura Empire, Akashi nya~! There is no injury that I cannot fix. Having that said, you should not take your life too lightly.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, what°Øs the matter? Can it be that you broke?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, care for a beverage? Freshly squeezed from another ship nya~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nn? What's this feeling? It's as if I've been damaged.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, because of your continued patronage of my shop, I have no choice but to return the favor with my body, nya~! ...Just kidding, nya. Having that said, I really do love you, Commander. Even more than I love gems, nya~
skins.acquisition: Commander, because of your continued patronage of my shop, I have no choice but to return the favor with my body, nya~! ...Just kidding, nya. Having that said, I really do love you, Commander. Even more than I love gems, nya~
skins.login: Commander, let's work hard today to make a pile of gems, nya~
skins.details: Not more than one pair of these super-premium clothes exist in this world, and they belong to the Commander, nya! ...If you're looking for some other, even more premium clothing, check out my store, nya?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I know you love me, but sometimes you see me only as a shopkeeper, nya! You can't keep treating me like this, nya!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if anything in my shop catches your eye, feel free to claim it, nya~ I'll deduct the cost from my wallet, nya! Because what's yours is mine, so your wallet is mine too, nya? Don't worry, I'll give you some discounts from time to time! ...Probably, nya!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, help me out at my store, nya! In exchange, I'll do my best as a secretary, nya! I'd say that's a good deal, nya!
skins.secretaryTouch: Mrrr... Commander, I'm getting sleepy, nya... Give me a lap pillow, nya...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nyahaha? Did you remember just how charming I am, nya?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!
skins.acquisition: Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!
skins.login: I have to work hard today as well to sell as much equipment as I can, nya!
skins.details: Commander, you've come to buy something, nya?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Uugh... the equipment isn't selling... Commander, buy it all, nya... just buy a little bit, nya...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Happy New Year! Want to buy something from Akashi's store?
skins.secretaryTouch: *yawns* ... Commander, stop moving around so much... I'm still sleepy, nya...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nya?! Akashi is not for sale, nya!

skins.shipDescription: Heheh, this is what I've been saving up for, nya~? A special dress that combines Gothic fashion with Sakura charm! Commander, how about those gems, nya?
skins.acquisition: Heheh, this is what I've been saving up for, nya~? A special dress that combines Gothic fashion with Sakura charm! Commander, how about those gems, nya?
skins.login: Commander, how can I help you, nya~
skins.details: Nya...aah?! This outfit... puts me way over budget! I'm going to have to think of some new promotions, nya... Commander?! H-how can I help you, nya?
skins.secretaryIdle1: There sure are a lot of people at this party, nya. Maybe I should open up a booth here, nya.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Since this celebration is such a special occasion, maybe I could afford to cut you a little discount, nya~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would you like some gems? Or maybe some wisdom cubes, nya? Or... maybe a generous bit of both, nya?
skins.secretaryTouch: Akashi earned all these gems here through hard work! Commander, I'm just letting you see them to motivate you, nya~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This place is locked behind a paywall, nya! Um... fifty gems per time, nya!

skins.shipDescription: Ohh, it's Commander, nya. Have you come to buy Akashi's new work, nya? Today's a holiday, so go ahead and enjoy yourself, nya~
skins.acquisition: Ohh, it's Commander, nya. Have you come to buy Akashi's new work, nya? Today's a holiday, so go ahead and enjoy yourself, nya~
skins.details: I'm drawing... ack, the stylus nib is getting worn out, nya. I'll have to get Shiranui to order some new ones, nya.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Today, I'm not a shopkeeper - I'm an author! I won't accept your gems today, nya!
skins.secretaryIdle2: St. Louis is a poster girl, nya?! Arghh... Next time, I'll need to get her to sit at my booth, nya... Wait, no, the genre might be a bit too different, nya...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Nya? If I sold my art digitally, I wouldn't have to sit here all day at the booth...? H-how convenient, nya...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nya?! This... this kind of stuff is only allowed in the thin books, nya!

skins.shipDescription: Hehehe, come on in, nya! Can I help you find something, nya? Your genial and knowledgeable staff, Akashi, will gladly provide her detailed recommendations, nya!
skins.acquisition: Hehehe, come on in, nya! Can I help you find something, nya? Your genial and knowledgeable staff, Akashi, will gladly provide her detailed recommendations, nya!
skins.login: Welcome, nya! Has Akashi convinced you to visit the store, nya?
skins.details: Hehehe, we broke our sales record today, nya! See, I can do anything if I set my mind to it, nya! You deserve thanks too, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I have an onboard factory that can produce as much energy as Yamato herself, nya. It's only natural I'd be an expert with consumer electronics, nya.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Let me guess: you're looking to buy some nyasty games, Commander? I'll wrap and bag it for you so nobody gives you weird looks, nya~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Nya? Are you looking for a particular item, nya? Then take a ticket and go right for the register, nya.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hmm? Do you wanna use our well-known photography hall, nya?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nya?! I-I'm going to report this, nya!
